dfischer.utils

Class AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage

  • public class AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for AlertConfigGenericNotification - allows to embed an image inside a HTML formatted alert notification.
    See Also:
    AlertConfigGenericNotification.addEmbeddedHtmlImage(AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage htmlImage), AlertConfigGenericNotification.getEmbeddedHtmlImages()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage()

      Create a clone.
      AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage(byte[] imageData, java.lang.String imageContentType, java.lang.String imageName, java.lang.String contentId)
      Create a new instance and clone input all data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage

        public AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage(byte[] imageData,
                                               java.lang.String imageContentType,
                                               java.lang.String imageName,
                                               java.lang.String contentId)
        Create a new instance and clone input all data.
        Parameters:
        imageData - the binary data of the image
        imageContentType - the MIME type of the image, for example "image/gif"
        imageName - an arbitrary name for the image, for example x.gif
        contentId - an arbitrary ID of the image. Note: the ID must be referenced as cid in the HTML message.
        HTML Example (contentId = 123): <img src="cid:123">

      • AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage

        public AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage(AlertConfigGenericNotificationEmbeddedHtmlImage o)
        Create a clone.
        Parameters:
        o - the object to be cloned.

        Empty constructor for object transfer.
